The company was founded in 2019 by private investors and a management team with a wealth of experience in building and managing industry leading companies in emerging markets, and with an international background in technology.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: UX Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	&nbsp;We are looking for a UX Specialist to help improve how our customers interact with our platform. As a UX Specialist, you will work closely with our local User Research team and Product Managers to understand Nigerian users, propose localised improvements, and turn insights into clear wireframes and prototypes that make sports betting faster, easier, and more exciting.


Responsibilities


	Initiate and conduct user research (interviews, surveys, usability testing) together with the local UXR team
	Analyse user behaviour, feedback, and competitor apps to identify opportunities
	Create wireframes, user flows, and mid-fidelity prototypes (mainly in Figma)
	Propose complete, Nigeria-specific design solutions for sports-betting features
	Present proposals to Product Managers and stakeholders
	Support continuous usability testing and UX improvement
	Collaborate daily with Nigeria-based User Researchers and UXR Leader


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree or equivalent in Computer Science, IT, Graphic/Interaction Design, or a related field.
	1&ndash;3 years of experience in UX design or research.
	Good knowledge of user-centered design and usability.
	Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and testing designs.
	Able to use simple data and analytics to improve user experience.
	Strong communication and problem-solving skills.
	Able to work well in a team and focus on delivering a great user experience.
	You are an active and passionate sports-betting user yourself (especially football and real sports) &ndash; this is mandatory and will be tested during the interview
	Proficient in Figma (mid-level or above)
	Must provide a portfolio or case studies with your application
	Basic understanding of mobile-money and African payment habits is a strong advantage


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr-nigeria@msport.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

UX Specialist Job at Mobile Sport Limited




        
    

        
        Mobile Sport Limited is an online gaming company established with Headquarters in Lagos State, Nigeria. The company was founded in 2019 by private investors and a management team with a wealth of experience in building and managing industry leading companies in emerging markets, and with an international background in technology.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: UX Specialist

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	 We are looking for a UX Specialist to help improve how our customers interact with our platform. As a UX Specialist, you will work closely with our local User Research team and Product Managers to understand Nigerian users, propose localised improvements, and turn insights into clear wireframes and prototypes that make sports betting faster, easier, and more exciting.


Responsibilities


	Initiate and conduct user research (interviews, surveys, usability testing) together with the local UXR team
	Analyse user behaviour, feedback, and competitor apps to identify opportunities
	Create wireframes, user flows, and mid-fidelity prototypes (mainly in Figma)
	Propose complete, Nigeria-specific design solutions for sports-betting features
	Present proposals to Product Managers and stakeholders
	Support continuous usability testing and UX improvement
	Collaborate daily with Nigeria-based User Researchers and UXR Leader


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in Computer Science, IT, Graphic/Interaction Design, or a related field.
	1–3 years of experience in UX design or research.
	Good knowledge of user-centered design and usability.
	Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and testing designs.
	Able to use simple data and analytics to improve user experience.
	Strong communication and problem-solving skills.
	Able to work well in a team and focus on delivering a great user experience.
	You are an active and passionate sports-betting user yourself (especially football and real sports) – this is mandatory and will be tested during the interview
	Proficient in Figma (mid-level or above)
	Must provide a portfolio or case studies with your application
	Basic understanding of mobile-money and African payment habits is a strong advantage


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr-nigeria@msport.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Recruitment Specialist Job at Comatrix Collection Service
content:
Comatrix Collection Service - We are a professional collection service provider that deals with helping various loan agencies in retrieving back their bad-loans as fast and effectively as possible.

We make calls to customers to pay their outstanding debts, Send messages to customers, Guide customers through the payment process, Persuade reluctant customers to make payment promptly, Meet weekly and monthly targets, Give proper and correct report of work.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Recruitment Specialist
Job Location: Abule Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Job posting and advertising: Creating job descriptions and posting them on job boards and social media platforms to attract candidates.
	Candidate sourcing: Actively searching for potential candidates through various channels such as LinkedIn, job fairs, and networking events.
	Screening and shortlisting: Reviewing resumes, conducting initial interviews, and evaluating candidates to determine their suitability for the position.
	Coordination: Scheduling interviews, communicating with candidates, and coordinating the hiring process between candidates and hiring managers.
	Onboarding: Assisting with the onboarding process for new hires, which may include paperwork, orientation, and integration into the company culture.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND / B.Sc Degrees with 1 - 2 years of relevant work experience.


Salary
N120,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@comatrix-collection.com using "Recruitment Specialist" as the subject of the email.
